listitem.synopsis: QUOTIENT dividend divisor (QUOTIENT dividend divisor) (QUOTIENT divisor) dividend / divisor

listitem.para: Outputs the quotient of its inputs. That is, it outputs dividend divided by divisor. QUOTIENT outputs an integer if and only if dividend is a multiple of divisor. For example, QUOTIENT 5 2 is 2.5, not 2, but QUOTIENT 4 2 is 2, not 2.0.
When the single input form is called, QUOTIENT outputs the reciprocal of the input.
It is an error to call QUOTIENT with a divisor of 0.
